name: Sneaky Boi (Beeman)
description:
This was a game that was created the Retrograde Jam and was built using the Unity Engine. The style and feel of the game was to replicate the style of late 80s/ early 90s Gameboy games.

A lot of the development was unfortunately completed last minute so there was a lot of bugs that were not able to be squashed before uploading (literally last minute).

Special thanks to Sam McCusker, the creator of the SFX and music. Always creates awesome stuff and gives the game play a lot more depth!
Definitely check out some of his other music on his Instagram

Known Issues:

  • Start Menu sometimes doesn't have a button selected.
  • When opening the Start Menu, the "End" button is selected first causing some people to quit out of the game

There are also some other bugs which impacts game play which I will not list here because it's sometimes fun to discover bugs yourself ;)
